慂字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǒng］
［《廣韻》余隴切，上腫，以。］
亦作“惥1”。“容2”的被通假字。
见“慫慂”。

慂字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　慂； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页397第17
【廣韻】余隴切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】尹竦切，?音勇。慫慂，勸也。【揚子·方言】南楚之閒，凡己不欲喜怒而旁人說者，謂之慫慂。　【通雅】慫慂，一作從容。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　慂; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 397 17
[Guangyun] Yu Longqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Yin Yuqie,? Yinyong. Counsel, persuade. [Yangtze Dialect] In the leisure of South Chu, people who do not want to be happy and angry but others say it is called agonizing.　【Tongya】Counsel, calm down.
